Plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.
Title: Mars Attacks!
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Glenn Close, Annette Bening, Pierce Brosnan
Writer: Len Brown (trading card series), Woody Gelman (trading card series), Wally Wood (trading card series), Bob Powell (trading card series), Norman Saunders (trading card series), Jonathan Gems (screen story), Jonathan Gems (screenplay)
